issue.title: Issues attempting to replay Gazebo log file

content.raw:
I get the same result for log files over 100 MB but am able to run log files of 60 MB.  Between 60 and 100 it sometimes works, sometimes doesn't.  Using an i7 6600U, 16 GB RAM.
Also, gzserver does not exit properly, so to do multiple runs I often have to kill gzserver before running again.
content.html: I get the same result for log files over 100 MB but am able to run log files of 60 MB. Between 60 and 100 it sometimes works, sometimes doesn't. Using an i7 6600U, 16 GB RAM. Also, gzserver does not exit properly, so to do multiple runs I often have to kill gzserver before running again.
